events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving significant damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported vehicle collision and damage description.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and guide through the process.
The insurance company has acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and has assured prompt assistance.
Customer is requested to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and the insurance policy for verification.
All required documents including photos, police report, and policy details have been submitted by the customer.
Investigation has commenced to assess the damage and verify the circumstances reported in the auto accident claim.
The investigation concluded confirming the collision details and the extent of damage to the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering repair costs and applicable deductibles.
Customer has responded positively and accepted the proposed settlement for the auto accident claim.
The claim has been officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms and conditions.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim has been processed and transferred to the customer's account.
The claim is now closed after successful settlement and payment issuance related to the vehicle accident.
All documents and correspondence related to the closed claim have been archived for future reference and audit.
